sentences.text: Risks Related to Ownership of Our Stock The trading price for our Class A common stock may continue to be volatile and the trading price for our newly distributed non-voting Class C capital stock may also be volatile.17The trading price of our stock has at times experienced substantial price volatility and may continue to be volatile..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: For example, from January 1, 2014 through December 31, 2014, the closing price of our Class A common stock, retroactively adjusted as if the Stock Split occurred on January 1, 2014, ranged from $498.16 per share to $610.70 per share, and from April 3, 2014 through December 31, 2014, the closing price of our Class C capital stock ranged from $495.39 to $596.08 per share..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: In addition, following the settlement of litigation involving the authorization to distribute our non-voting Class C capital stock, our board of directors approved a distribution of shares of Class C capital stock as a dividend to our holders of Class A and Class B common stock with a payment date of April 2, 2014, and on April 3, 2014, Class C capital stock was listed on The NASDAQ Global Select Market..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: In accordance with the settlement, we may be obligated to make a payment to holders of Class C capital stock if, on average, Class C capital stock trades below Class A common stock during the first 365 days following the first date the Class C capital stock trades..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: If such a payment is required, it must be made to holders of the Class C stock in cash, Class A stock, Class C stock, or a combination thereof, at the discretion of the board of directors..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Over time, we cannot reliably predict what, if any, patterns will emerge with respect to the relative trading prices of Class A common stock and Class C capital stock..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: The trading price of our Class A common stock and Class C capital stock may fluctuate widely in response to various factors, some of which are beyond our control..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: These factors include, among others: • Quarterly variations in our results of operations or those of our competitors..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: • Announcements by us or our competitors of acquisitions, new products, significant contracts, commercial relationships, or capital commitments..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Recommendations by securities analysts or changes in earnings estimates..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Announcements about our earnings that are not in line with analyst expectations, the risk of which is enhanced because it is our policy not to give guidance on earnings..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Announcements by our competitors of their earnings that are not in line with analyst expectations..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: • Commentary by industry and market professionals about our products, strategies, and other matters affecting our business and results, regardless of its accuracy ..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • The volume of shares of Class A common stock and Class C capital stock available for public sale..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Sales of Class A common stock and Class C capital stock by us or by our stockholders (including sales by our directors, executive officers, and other employees)..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Short sales, hedging, and other derivative transactions on shares of our Class A common stock and Class C capital stock..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • The perceived values of Class A common stock and Class C capital stock relative to one another ..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: In addition, the stock market in general, and the market for technology companies in particular , have experienced extreme price and volume fluctuations that have often been unrelated or disproportionate to the operating performance of those companies..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: These broad market and industry factors may harm the market price of our Class A common stock and our Class C capital stock regardless of our actual operating performance..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: The concentration of our stock ownership limits our stockholders’ ability to influence corporate matters..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Our Class B common stock has 10 votes per share, our Class A common stock has one vote per share, and our Class C capital stock has no voting rights..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: As of December 31, 2014, Larry , Sergey , and Eric beneficially owned approximately 92.5% of our outstanding Class B common stock, which represented approximately 60.1% of the voting power of our outstanding capital stock..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Larry , Sergey , and Eric therefore have significant influence over management and affairs and over all matters requiring stockholder approval, including the election of directors and significant 18corporate transactions, such as a merger or other sale of our company or our assets, for the foreseeable future..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: In addition, because our Class C capital stock carries no voting rights (except as required by applicable law), the issuance of the Class C capital stock, including in future stock-based acquisition transactions and to fund employee equity incentive programs, could prolong the duration of Larry and Sergey’ s current relative ownership of our voting power and their ability to elect all of our directors and to determine the outcome of most matters submitted to a vote of our stockholders..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Together with Eric, they would also continue to be able to control any required stockholder vote with respect to certain change in control transactions involving Google (including an acquisition of Google by another company)..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: This concentrated control limits or severely restricts our stockholders’ ability to influence corporate matters and, as a result, we may take actions that our stockholders do not view as beneficial..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: As a result, the market price of our Class A common stock and our Class C capital stock could be adversely affected..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Provisions in our charter documents and under Delaware law could discourage a takeover that stockholders may consider favorable..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: Provisions in our certificate of incorporation and bylaws may have the effect of delaying or preventing a change of control or changes in our management..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: These provisions include the following: • Our certificate of incorporation provides for a tri-class capital stock structure..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: As a result of this structure, Larry , Sergey , and Eric have significant influence over all matters requiring stockholder approval, including the election of directors and significant corporate transactions, such as a merger or other sale of our company or our assets..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: This concentrated control could discourage others from initiating any potential merger , takeover , or other change of control transaction that other stockholders may view as beneficial..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: As noted above, the issuance of the Class C capital stock could have the effect of prolonging the influence of Larry , Sergey , and Eric..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Our board of directors has the right to elect directors to fill a vacancy created by the expansion of the board of directors or the resignation, death, or removal of a director , which prevents stockholders from being able to fill vacancies on our board of directors..
sentences.label: neutral

sentences.text: • Our stockholders may not act by written consent..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: As a result, a holder , or holders, controlling a majority of our capital stock would not be able to take certain actions without holding a stockholders' meeting..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Our certificate of incorporation prohibits cumulative voting in the election of directors..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: This limits the ability of minority stockholders to elect director candidates..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Stockholders must provide advance notice to nominate individuals for election to the board of directors or to propose matters that can be acted upon at a stockholders’ meeting..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: These provisions may discourage or deter a potential acquirer from conducting a solicitation of proxies to elect the acquirer's own slate of directors or otherwise attempting to obtain control of our company ..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: • Our board of directors may issue, without stockholder approval, shares of undesignated preferred stock..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: The ability to issue undesignated preferred stock makes it possible for our board of directors to issue preferred stock with voting or other rights or preferences that could impede the success of any attempt to acquire us..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: As a Delaware corporation, we are also subject to certain Delaware anti-takeover provisions..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Under Delaware law, a corporation may not engage in a business combination with any holder of 15% or more of its outstanding voting stock unless the holder has held the stock for three years or, among other things, the board of directors has approved the transaction..
sentences.label: positive

sentences.text: Our board of directors could rely on Delaware law to prevent or delay an acquisition of us..
sentences.label: positive
